mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_board where status = 'Y' and board_type = 'NO'

select to_number(substr(board_no, instr(board_no, '_') + 1)) AS board_no, board_title, mem_name, b.enroll_date, read_count, ( select count(*) from tb_attachment where ref_no = to_number(substr(board_no, instr(board_no, '_') + 1)) ) as attach_count from tb_board b join tb_mem using (mem_no) where b.status = 'Y' AND board_type = 'NO' order by to_number(substr(board_no, instr(board_no, '_') + 1)) desc
select board_type , board_title from ( select * from tb_board b order by b.enroll_date desc ) where rownum between 1 and 5
